sectors.name: technology
sectors.description: The sector focused on the creation, management, and innovation of software, data systems, and digital infrastructure.

branches.name: Software Development
branches.description: Roles focused on designing, coding, and maintaining web-based applications and software solutions.

specializations.name: FRONTEND_DEVELOPER
specializations.description: Specialises in building the visual and interactive elements of websites and applications that users interact with directly.

specializations.name: BACKEND_DEVELOPER
specializations.description: Focuses on server-side logic, databases, and application architecture that power the user-facing side of software.

branches.name: Mobile Development
branches.description: Roles dedicated to building applications specifically for mobile operating systems and devices.

specializations.name: IOS_DEVELOPER
specializations.description: Develops applications specifically for Apple's iOS ecosystem using Swift or Objective-C.

specializations.name: ANDROID_DEVELOPER
specializations.description: Develops applications specifically for the Android operating system using Kotlin or Java.

specializations.name: MOBILE_DEVELOPMENT_CROSS_PLATFORM
specializations.description: Builds mobile applications that run on multiple operating systems using frameworks like React Native or Flutter.

branches.name: Data Science & AI
branches.description: The branch concerned with extracting insights from data and building intelligent systems.

specializations.name: DATA_SCIENTIST
specializations.description: Uses advanced statistical methods and machine learning to analyse complex data and solve business problems.

specializations.name: DATA_ANALYST
specializations.description: Interprets data sets to identify trends, create visualisations, and generate actionable business insights.

specializations.name: DATA_ENGINEER
specializations.description: Builds and maintains the pipelines and infrastructure required to collect, store, and process large scale data.

specializations.name: AI_ML_ENGINEER
specializations.description: Designs and deploys artificial intelligence models and machine learning algorithms into production environments.

branches.name: Infrastructure & Cloud Operations
branches.description: Roles focused on the underlying systems, networks, and cloud environments that support software applications.

specializations.name: DEVOPS_ENGINEER
specializations.description: Bridges development and operations to automate deployment, ensuring continuous integration and delivery.

specializations.name: CLOUD_ENGINEER
specializations.description: Architects and manages cloud computing strategies and services on platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.

specializations.name: DATABASE_ADMINISTRATOR_DBA
specializations.description: Ensures the performance, integrity, and security of organisational databases.

specializations.name: NETWORK_ENGINEER
specializations.description: Designs, implements, and manages local and wide area networks to ensure connectivity and uptime.

specializations.name: SYSTEMS_ADMINISTRATOR
specializations.description: Manages and configures server hardware, software, and operating systems to ensure organisational IT reliability.

branches.name: Cybersecurity
branches.description: The practice of protecting systems, networks, and programs from digital attacks.

specializations.name: CYBERSECURITY_ANALYST
specializations.description: Monitors networks for security breaches, investigates violations, and implements protection measures.

branches.name: Quality Assurance
branches.description: Ensures software reliability and standards through rigorous testing and validation.

specializations.name: QA_AUTOMATION_ENGINEER_SET
specializations.description: Writes scripts and uses tools to automate the testing of software to identify bugs and ensure quality.

branches.name: Product & Design
branches.description: Roles that define the user experience, feature set, and strategic execution of technical products.

specializations.name: UX_UI_DESIGNER
specializations.description: Designs user interfaces and experiences, ensuring products are intuitive, accessible, and visually appealing.

specializations.name: TECHNICAL_PRODUCT_MANAGER
specializations.description: Oversees the product lifecycle, translating business requirements into technical specifications for engineering teams.

specializations.name: TECHNICAL_PROJECT_MANAGER_SCRUM_MASTER
specializations.description: Facilitates agile processes and manages project timelines to ensure engineering teams deliver value efficiently.

sectors.name: finance
sectors.description: The sector dealing with the management of money, investments, banking, and financial regulation.

branches.name: Investment Banking & Asset Management
branches.description: Roles focused on raising capital, managing investments, and growing wealth for individuals and corporations.

specializations.name: investment_banker
specializations.description: Advises companies on capital raising, mergers, and acquisitions to maximise financial growth.

specializations.name: portfolio_manager
specializations.description: Makes investment decisions and manages collections of assets to meet specific financial goals for clients.

specializations.name: trader
specializations.description: Buys and sells financial instruments in capital markets to capture short-term profits.

specializations.name: fund_manager
specializations.description: Oversees mutual funds, hedge funds, or pension funds, making strategic trading decisions.

specializations.name: wealth_manager
specializations.description: Provides comprehensive financial planning and investment advice to high-net-worth individuals.

branches.name: Financial Analysis & Planning
branches.description: Focuses on evaluating economic trends, budgeting, and planning future financial stability.

specializations.name: financial_analyst
specializations.description: Analyses financial data to guide business decisions and forecast future economic conditions.

specializations.name: financial_planner
specializations.description: Helps individuals and corporations create strategies to meet long-term financial objectives.

specializations.name: budget_analyst
specializations.description: helps organisations organise their finances, preparing budget reports and monitoring institutional spending.

branches.name: Accounting & Auditing
branches.description: The branch dedicated to recording, examining, and reporting financial transactions accurately.

specializations.name: accountant
specializations.description: Prepares and examines financial records, ensuring accuracy and payment of taxes.

specializations.name: tax_consultant
specializations.description: Advises clients on tax strategies and compliance with complex tax legislation.

specializations.name: auditor
specializations.description: Reviews financial statements and operational processes to ensure compliance and accuracy.

branches.name: Risk Management & Compliance
branches.description: Roles focused on identifying financial risks and ensuring adherence to laws and regulations.

specializations.name: risk_manager
specializations.description: Identifies and assesses threats to an organisation's capital and earnings, implementing mitigation strategies.

specializations.name: compliance_officer
specializations.description: Ensures the company operates within the legal framework and adheres to internal policies.

specializations.name: credit_analyst
specializations.description: Evaluates the creditworthiness of loan applicants to determine risk levels for lenders.

specializations.name: insurance_underwriter
specializations.description: Evaluates insurance applications to determine coverage amounts and premiums based on risk.

sectors.name: health_social_care
sectors.description: The sector dedicated to the treatment of patients, promotion of health, and provision of social support.

branches.name: Nursing & Midwifery
branches.description: Clinical roles focused on providing direct patient care, support during childbirth, and health maintenance.

specializations.name: nurse
specializations.description: Provides medical care, monitors patient health, and assists doctors in various healthcare settings.

specializations.name: midwife
specializations.description: Specialises in pregnancy, childbirth, and postpartum care for women and newborns.

branches.name: Allied Health & Therapy
branches.description: Therapeutic roles focused on rehabilitation, mental health, and physical well-being.

specializations.name: occupational_therapist
specializations.description: Helps patients improve their ability to perform daily living and working tasks after illness or injury.

specializations.name: physiotherapist
specializations.description: Treats physical ailments and injuries through exercise, manual therapy, and rehabilitation techniques.

specializations.name: mental_health_counselor
specializations.description: Provides support and therapy for individuals dealing with mental health issues and emotional distress.

branches.name: Social Care & Support
branches.description: Roles focused on supporting vulnerable individuals and communities in their daily lives.

specializations.name: care_worker
specializations.description: Assists elderly or disabled individuals with daily activities and personal care.

specializations.name: social_worker
specializations.description: Supports individuals and families through difficult times, ensuring vulnerable people are protected.

specializations.name: healthcare_assistant
specializations.description: Supports medical staff by monitoring patient vitals and assisting with basic care tasks.

branches.name: Public Health
branches.description: Focuses on the health of populations through prevention and education.

specializations.name: public_health_officer
specializations.description: Monitors community health standards and implements programmes to prevent disease and promote wellness.

sectors.name: education
sectors.description: The sector responsible for facilitating learning and acquiring knowledge, skills, and values.

branches.name: Teaching & Instruction
branches.description: Roles dedicated to the direct instruction and mentorship of students.

specializations.name: teacher
specializations.description: Delivers curriculum and facilitates learning for students in schools or educational institutions.

specializations.name: special_need_educator
specializations.description: Adapts teaching methods to meet the unique learning requirements of students with disabilities.

sectors.name: construction
sectors.description: The sector involved in designing, planning, and building infrastructure and structures.

branches.name: Engineering & Design
branches.description: Technical roles focused on the structural integrity and architectural design of projects.

specializations.name: civil_engineer
specializations.description: Designs and oversees the construction of infrastructure projects like roads, bridges, and water systems.

specializations.name: architect
specializations.description: Plans and designs the functional and aesthetic aspects of buildings and structures.

specializations.name: structural_engineer
specializations.description: Calculates and analyses the stability and strength of structures to ensure they can withstand loads.

branches.name: Construction Management & Cost
branches.description: Roles that manage the logistics, financials, and onsite execution of construction projects.

specializations.name: site_manager
specializations.description: Oversees day-to-day operations on a construction site, ensuring safety and schedule compliance.

specializations.name: quantity_surveyor
specializations.description: Manages construction costs and contracts to ensure projects stay within budget.

specializations.name: project_manager
specializations.description: Plans and coordinates the entire construction lifecycle, managing resources, timelines, and stakeholders.

branches.name: Trades & Labour
branches.description: Hands-on roles responsible for the physical building and assembly tasks.

specializations.name: construction_worker
specializations.description: Performs physical labour on construction sites, operating machinery and handling building materials.
